node_info.name: xml
node_info.description: Convert data from and to XML
node_info.subtitle: ={{$parameter["mode"]==="jsonToxml" ? "JSON to XML" : "XML to JSON"}}

generic.label: What are APIs and how to use them with no code

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Converts data from JSON to XML

options.name: JSON to XML
options.description: Converts data from JSON to XML

options.name: XML to JSON
options.description: Converts data from XML to JSON

properties.displayName: If your XML is inside a binary file, use the 'Extract from File' node to convert it to text first
properties.name: xmlNotice
dataPropertyName
properties.description: Name of the property to which to contains the converted XML data

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to allow using characters from the Unicode surrogate blocks

options.name: allowSurrogateChars
options.description: Whether to allow using characters from the Unicode surrogate blocks

options.name: attrkey
options.description: Prefix that is used to access the attributes

options.name: cdata
options.description: Whether to wrap text nodes in <![CDATA[ ... ]]> instead of escaping when necessary. Does not add <![CDATA[ ... ]]> if it is not required.

options.name: charkey
options.description: Prefix that is used to access the character content

options.name: headless
options.description: Whether to omit the XML header

options.name: rootName
options.description: Root element name to be used

properties.name: dataPropertyName
properties.description: Name of the property which contains the XML data to convert

properties.name: options
properties.description: Prefix that is used to access the attributes

options.name: attrkey
options.description: Prefix that is used to access the attributes

options.name: charkey
options.description: Prefix that is used to access the character content

options.name: explicitArray
options.description: Whether to always put child nodes in an array if true; otherwise an array is created only if there is more than one

options.name: explicitRoot
options.description: Whether to set this if you want to get the root node in the resulting object

options.name: ignoreAttrs
options.description: Whether to ignore all XML attributes and only create text nodes

options.name: mergeAttrs
options.description: Whether to merge attributes and child elements as properties of the parent, instead of keying attributes off a child attribute object. This option is ignored if ignoreAttrs is true.

options.name: normalize
options.description: Whether to trim whitespaces inside text nodes

options.name: normalizeTags
options.description: Whether to normalize all tag names to lowercase

options.name: trim
options.description: Whether to trim the whitespace at the beginning and end of text nodes

possibleValues.name: JSON to XML
possibleValues.description: Converts data from JSON to XML

possibleValues.name: XML to JSON
possibleValues.description: Converts data from XML to JSON

xmlNotice.displayName: If your XML is inside a binary file, use the 'Extract from File' node to convert it to text first
xmlNotice.name: xmlNotice

subProperties.name: attrkey
subProperties.description: Prefix that is used to access the attributes

subProperties.name: charkey
subProperties.description: Prefix that is used to access the character content

subProperties.name: explicitArray
subProperties.description: Whether to always put child nodes in an array if true; otherwise an array is created only if there is more than one

subProperties.name: explicitRoot
subProperties.description: Whether to set this if you want to get the root node in the resulting object

subProperties.name: ignoreAttrs
subProperties.description: Whether to ignore all XML attributes and only create text nodes

subProperties.name: mergeAttrs
subProperties.description: Whether to merge attributes and child elements as properties of the parent, instead of keying attributes off a child attribute object. This option is ignored if ignoreAttrs is true.

subProperties.name: normalize
subProperties.description: Whether to trim whitespaces inside text nodes

subProperties.name: normalizeTags
subProperties.description: Whether to normalize all tag names to lowercase

subProperties.name: trim
subProperties.description: Whether to trim the whitespace at the beginning and end of text nodes

notices.name: xmlNotice
notices.text: If your XML is inside a binary file, use the 'Extract from File' node to convert it to text first

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
